price: Hakika Sisi ndio tulio teremsha Ukumbusho huu, na hakika Sisi ndio tutao ulinda.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ
footnotes: Na hakika, kwa ajili ya kuwa Wito wa Nabii huyu kwendea Haki udumu mpaka Siku ya Kiyama, hatuwateremshi Malaika, bali tumewateremshia hii Qur'ani ambayo kukumbusha kwake kunaendelea daima dawamu. Na Sisi ndio wenye kuilinda isiingiliwe na mageuzo na mabadiliko yoyote mpaka kusimama Kiyama.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā al-dhik'ra wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
